term.title: Schenck reaction

item.text: The diastereoselective ene reaction of singlet molecular dioxygen with alkenes.,An example is:,[image: Not defined]

sources.item: PAC, 2007, 79, 293. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry, 3rd edition (IUPAC Recommendations 2006)' on page 418 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200779030293)

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
